title: Fresh fig and ginger jam
ingredients: ['1.4kg fresh green or black figs, diced', '1.4kg granulated sugar', '2 tablespoons ground ginger', '4 large green apples, peeled and diced', '5 tablespoons white wine vinegar', '4 lemons, juiced', '1 thumb-sized piece root ginger, finely chopped', '300ml water', 'ground cinnamon, mace and nutmeg to taste (optional)']
